title: Greek Doctor, Cinderella Bride
description: Dressed in her shapeless lab coats and baggy clothes, medical-research assistant Izzy Nolan doesn't look like she was once a top model. But ever since the tragic incident that left her emotionally and physically scarred, she has hidden herself away.Greek doctor Alex Zaphirides can have any woman he wants, but he has sworn off love. Despite this, he's intrigued by shy, innocent Izzy. Alex cannot help but want to show her just how beautiful she really is. If only she would let down her guard and allow Alex to be the Prince Charming she deserves....(Harlequin Medical Romance 401)
author: Amy Andrews
